channel.title: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE
channel.description:
[B]DO NOT BE A TOPIC CREEPER. Please reply. i spend alot of time on my models, and the least you can do is give your opinions[/B]
Well, ive been trying things that i thought would be impossible for someone with my level of skill (which, trust me, isnt a high level in comparison to many), and came up with this. After a few hours of hardcore modelling, this is what ive come up with. NOTE: I KNOW i havent gotten around to adding clothes, dw there is nothing obscure here. V1 only consists of getting the human muscle form atleast semi-correct. Skin color needs work, i know. None the less. here it is. Yea, hes headless. lmao the head will be the hard part.
[B]BE MATURE here, i dont want no "ewww its got no clothes". Grow up if thats all that comes to your mind.[/b]
[B][U]Version 1[/B][/U] Top View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/bodyimg2.jpg[/img] Overall View [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/bodyimg1.jpg[/img] Wire Frame [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/Bodyimg3.jpg[/img]
[u][b]Version 1.2[/b][/u] [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/V1-2.jpg[/img]
[b][u]Version 2[/u][/b] Id say this is a decent sized update since version one. full clothing added not counting shoes. all thats left is hands and an actual head then i oculd get to animating. [IMG]http://i369.photobucket.com/albums/oo131/0xXDylanXx0/V3.jpg[/img]
I DO expect to keep updating this and possibly animate it. I will add clothes once i feel muscle structure is close enough to that of a human (male). Female may or may not be done. who knows how long ill be motivated to do the human.
Constructive Criticism is welcome.

item.title: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE
item.dc:creator: @jjones10 jjones10
item.description:
@jjones10 wrote:

Only problems i see are that his posture is WAY to good to be true lol. He needs to be a little bit slouchyer. If thats a word.
Hands and feet for sure. And needs hips.

Animating will be a challenge. You need to make it so muscles move and evenrything, not just rotating joints around. I cant wait to see the final product. Good job.

Read full topic

item.source: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE

item.title: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

Not bad at all, I agree with Archer however, Modeling humans is very tricky but i do like how you modeled the muscle in. Also that many polygons would face so many problems being animated and in most games today you don’t have to model a whole lot as the texture artist will make a HUGE difference, but that doesn’t mean slack on the detail

Read full topic

P.s, tell your clay man, i love his sexy pack xD

item.title: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

So this is blender… ( sorry, never knew what it was until now lol ) it looks great so far, ad I can’t wait to see the improvements. But are you going to change the skin color? Because that’s really the only problem I could see with it…it does look clayish lol

Read full topic
item.source: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE

item.title: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE
item.dc:creator: @archerer98 Archer
item.description:
@archerer98 wrote:

It’s nice, but I would check out as much tutorials as you can, seeing as Humans are a very hard thing to model. Also, if you are going to add cloths, make it easy on yourself and only model parts of the skin that will be seen…I saw how WOW did their models and they only model the head and some of the neck and then put cloths over where it ends, do that for hands and feet to I suppose.

Read full topic

item.title: [WIP] High Poly Human Body - Version 2[/WIP] - HUGE UPDATE
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

DO NOT BE A TOPIC CREEPER. Please reply. i spend alot of time on my models, and the least you can do is give your opinions

Well, ive been trying things that i thought would be impossible for someone with my level of skill (which, trust me, isnt a high level in comparison to many), and came up with this. After a few hours of hardcore modelling, this is what ive come up with. NOTE: I KNOW i havent gotten around to adding clothes, dw there is nothing obscure here. V1 only consists of getting the human muscle form atleast semi-correct. Skin color needs work, i know. None the less. here it is.
Yea, hes headless. lmao the head will be the hard part.

BE MATURE here, i dont want no “ewww its got no clothes”. Grow up if thats all that comes to your mind.

[U]Version 1[/U]
Top View

Overall View

Wire Frame

Version 1.2

Version 2
Id say this is a decent sized update since version one. full clothing added not counting shoes. all thats left is hands and an actual head then i oculd get to animating.

I DO expect to keep updating this and possibly animate it. I will add clothes once i feel muscle structure is close enough to that of a human (male). Female may or may not be done. who knows how long ill be motivated to do the human.

Constructive Criticism is welcome.

Read full topic
